login.title: Login
login.description: Login to enable SSH session cloud sync

register.title: Create Account
register.description: Register to use SSH session cloud sync

hints.serverUrlConfig: Server address can be configured in settings
hints.minPasswordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

error.serverUrlNotSet: Please configure server address in settings first
error.networkError: Network connection failed, please check network settings
error.unknownError: Unknown error, please try again later

terminal.noActiveSessionHint: Click the button below to create a new SSH connection, or select another feature from the sidebar
terminal.selectOrCreateTab: Select or create a tab to get started

newTab.name: New Tab
newTab.description: Duplicate current terminal connection, create new tab (opens quick connect if no active tab)

openNLToCmd.name: AI Generate Command
openNLToCmd.description: Open AI natural language to command panel (Shift+#)

explainCommand.name: AI Explain Command
explainCommand.description: Explain selected command (need to select command in terminal first)

analyzeError.name: AI Analyze Error
analyzeError.description: Analyze selected error message (need to select error text in terminal first)

quickConnect.name: New Session
quickConnect.description: Create new session in session management page

error.hasActiveConnections: This session has active connections. Please disconnect all connections before deleting

quickConnect.title: Quick Connect
quickConnect.description: Quickly establish SSH connection without saving configuration

save.title: Save Session Configuration
save.description: Save SSH session configuration locally for quick future connections

info.title: Save Instructions
info.encryption: Session configuration will be encrypted and saved to local storage
info.aesEncryption: Passwords are encrypted using AES before storage
info.viewInManager: View saved sessions in Session Manager after saving
info.editAndDelete: Support editing and deleting saved sessions

field.name: Session Name
field.nameHint: Specify a memorable name for this connection configuration
field.groupHint: Group sessions for easy organization (default: Default Group)
field.passwordHint: Enter password to complete authentication configuration
field.passwordSecurityHint: Password will be encrypted and saved locally
field.passphrasePlaceholder: If private key is password protected
field.terminalTypeHint: Specify the terminal emulation type, usually use default value

confirmDelete.title: Confirm Delete
confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete session "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

terminal.title: Terminal Settings
terminal.keepAliveIntervalDescription: Interval in seconds to keep SSH connection active: {{value}}s
terminal.keepAliveIntervalTip: Enable heartbeat to prevent SSH connection from disconnecting due to long idle time. Recommended setting: 30-60 seconds to balance performance and connection stability. Set to 0 to disable heartbeat.

defaultProvider.title: Default AI Service
defaultProvider.label: Select default AI service
defaultProvider.hint: Enabled services will be used as default provider for AI features

providers.title: Configured AI Services
providers.addDialogDescription: Select service type and enter name
providers.modeLocalHint: Local service runs on intranet, no API Key configuration needed
providers.modeApiHint: API service requires API Key for authentication
providers.name: Service Name
providers.baseUrlOllamaHint: Ollama service address (default http://localhost:11434 after local installation)
providers.baseUrlHint: Base URL for API (usually no need to modify)
providers.temperatureHint: Control response randomness (0-2, higher values are more random)
providers.addSuccess: New service added (please fill in configuration and click "Save Configuration")

usageTips.title: Usage Tips
usageTips.openai: OpenAI: Requires API Key, fast response, high quality, pay per use
usageTips.ollama: Ollama: Runs locally, completely free, data privacy secure, requires Ollama installation first
usageTips.testFirst: Test connection first to ensure configuration is correct before using AI features
usageTips.multipleProviders: Can configure multiple providers, switch anytime
usageTips.rememberToSave: Remember to click "Save Configuration" after modifying settings

shortcuts.title: AI Feature Shortcuts:
shortcuts.explainCommand: Command Explanation: Select command and press Ctrl+Shift+A
shortcuts.nlToCommand: Natural Language to Command: Type # + description
shortcuts.errorAnalysis: Error Analysis: Automatically detect and provide solutions

keybindings.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keybindings.description: Customize app shortcuts to improve efficiency

serverUrl.label: Server URL
serverUrl.description: SSH session cloud sync server address

autoSync.label: Auto Sync
autoSync.description: Automatically sync SSH sessions to cloud server (not supported yet)

syncInterval.label: Sync Interval
syncInterval.description: Auto sync time interval in minutes (not supported yet)

theme.label: Theme Mode
theme.description: Select the theme appearance of the application

notifications.label: Notifications
notifications.description: Receive connection status and error notifications

videoQuality.label: Video Recording Quality
videoQuality.description: Select video recording quality (affects video file size)

videoFormat.label: Video Recording Format
videoFormat.description: Select video recording format (WebM recommended for web playback)

recordMicrophone.label: Record Microphone
recordMicrophone.description: Record user voice through microphone (requires user authorization)
recordMicrophone.warning: Important Note: The system will automatically filter out system audio devices like Stereo Mix. If you find that music or other application sounds are being recorded, please check your system audio settings to ensure you have selected the correct microphone device instead of the mix device.

recordSpeaker.label: Record Speaker (System Audio)
recordSpeaker.description: Record system playback sounds (Windows WASAPI Loopback Recording)

audioQuality.label: Audio Recording Quality
audioQuality.description: Select audio recording quality (affects audio file size)

audioSampleRate.label: Audio Sample Rate
audioSampleRate.description: Select audio recording sample rate (current: {{rate}} Hz)

tips.title: Recording Tips
tips.tip1: Audio recording requires browser permissions. Enabling microphone recording requires user authorization
tips.tip2: Speaker recording is only available on platforms that support WASAPI Loopback Recording (Windows)
tips.tip3: If microphone recording captures system audio (music, etc.), please check the default recording device in system settings
tips.tip4: It is recommended to disable the Stereo Mix device in Windows settings to avoid accidental selection
tips.micCheck: How to check microphone device: Open Windows Settings - System - Sound - Input devices, confirm the correct microphone device is selected, not Stereo Mix.

about.title: SSH Terminal
about.description: Modern SSH terminal management tool built with Tauri 2.0 and React 19

repository.title: Open Source Repository
repository.description: Welcome to visit the GitHub repository to view source code, submit issues, or contribute

about.madeWith: Made with ❤️ using Tauri and React

manager.title: Recording File Manager
manager.emptyMessage: Recording files will appear here after you start recording
manager.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete recording file "{{name}}"?
manager.confirmDeleteWarning: This action cannot be undone, the file will be permanently deleted.

export.title: Export as Video
export.description: This recording contains pre-recorded video. Exported video will use the format and quality settings from recording time.
export.formatHint: Format and quality are configured in "Settings 鈫?Session". Supports WebM and MP4 formats.
export.warning: If there is no pre-recorded video, export may take a long time, please be patient. Do not close the window during export.

sync.successDescription: All data has been synchronized to the server

path.placeholder: Enter path, press Enter to navigate

error.connectFirst: Please connect to an SSH server first on the Terminal page
error.fileNotExists: File or directory does not exist

confirmDelete.title: Confirm Delete
confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete selected {{count}} items?

chat.title: AI Chat
chat.inputOfflineHint: Current server is offline. You can continue asking general technical questions, but cannot perform server-related operations.
chat.inputPlaceholderOnline: Enter your question... (Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line)
chat.inputPlaceholderOffline: Enter message (offline mode)... (Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line)
chat.selectServerOrNew: Select a server from the left, or create a new conversation
chat.clickToOpenSidebar: Click the button above to open the sidebar and select a server
chat.clickToCreateNew: Click the button above to create a new conversation
chat.assistantDescription: Chat with AI assistant, ask about command explanations, error analysis, etc.
chat.noConnectionHint: Please open a terminal connection first, then you can chat with AI
chat.noConfigHint: Please configure and enable AI Provider in settings first
chat.startConversationHint: You can ask about Linux commands, system operations, scripting, etc.

conversation.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?

explain.noProvider: Please configure and enable AI Provider in settings first
explain.title: AI Command Explanation
explain.description: AI will explain the function, parameters, use cases, and risk tips of the selected command
explain.emptyMessage: Click the button below to start AI explanation

nl2cmd.title: Natural Language to Command
nl2cmd.description: Describe the operation you want to perform in natural language, and AI will generate the corresponding command
nl2cmd.noProvider: Please configure and enable AI Provider in settings first
nl2cmd.example: e.g., Delete log files older than 30 days

errorAnalysis.title: AI Error Analysis
errorAnalysis.description: AI will analyze the error and provide solutions
errorAnalysis.noProvider: Please configure and enable AI Provider in settings first

cache.title: AI Provider Cache Management
cache.emptyMessage: Cache will be created automatically after using AI features
cache.infoCacheMechanism: Cache Mechanism: Same AI configuration will be automatically reused, improving performance by ~90%
cache.infoHotReload: Hot Reload: Use when configuration files are modified externally, intelligently clean up changed providers
cache.infoClearCache: Clear Cache: Use when configuration changes significantly or encountering issues
cache.infoAutoManagement: Auto Management: Automatically clean up related caches when saving configuration
cache.clearSuccessDescription: All AI Provider caches have been cleared
cache.confirmClearMessage: This operation will clear all AI Provider caches. After clearing, AI calls will recreate the cache next time.

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.emailLocked: Email cannot be modified, please contact customer service for changes

validation.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported image format: {{format}}. Only JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, BMP, SVG formats are supported

hostKey.title: Host Key Verification
hostKey.description: First connection to this host, need to verify its identity
hostKey.securityTip: Security Tip: Please verify this fingerprint matches what the server administrator provided. If unsure, contact the server administrator for verification.

empty.noMatchesHint: Try adjusting search conditions or filters
empty.noSessionsHint: Create your first SSH session configuration
empty.navigateToTerminal: Go to Terminal page to create new connection

conflict.title: Shortcut Conflict
conflict.message: Shortcut {{binding}} is already used by "{{actionName}}". Overwrite?

preset.loadConfirm: Are you sure you want to load preset "{{name}}"? This will overwrite current keybinding configuration.

reset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset to default keybindings? This will clear all custom configurations.
reset.title: Confirm Reset

import.confirm: Importing keybinding configuration will overwrite current settings. Continue?
import.title: Confirm Import

recorder.title: Record Shortcut
recorder.description: Please press the key combination you want to set
recorder.recordingSupport: Supports combinations of Ctrl, Alt, Shift and letters/numbers/function keys
